Export.Routine: loadtest(classname) write "Reading data from class: ", classname,! write "..#FileName : ",$parameter(classname,"FileName"),! set ts=$zh do $classmethod(classname,"ReadNextLine",1) write "Time to first line: ",$zh-ts,! set counter=1 set totalRead=$l(%dlRecord) while $classmethod(classname,"ReadNextLine",1) { set counter=counter+1 set line=%dlRecord //write !,$p(line,"|",1) ," ",$p(line,"|",$l(line,"|")-1) //zw set totalRead=totalRead+$l(line)+1 } write "Time to last line: ",$zh-ts,! write "Total records read: ", counter,! write "Total bytes read: ", totalRead,! quit
